Description:
We are looking for an experienced Accountant to join our team in Kuwait. As an Accountant, you will be responsible for managing financial transactions, analyzing financial data, and preparing financial reports. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in accounting principles and practices, excellent analytical skills, and the ability to work independently. If you are detail-oriented, organized, and have a passion for numbers, we would love to hear from you.Responsibilities:Manage all accounting operations including accounts payable, accounts receivable, general ledger, and bank reconciliations
Prepare and analyze financial statements, budgets, and forecasts
Ensure compliance with accounting standards and regulations
Assist in the preparation of financial reports for management and external stakeholders
Monitor and maintain accurate records of financial transactions
Review and reconcile financial discrepancies
Provide financial analysis and support to management
Assist in the implementation and improvement of accounting systems and controls
Collaborate with other departments to ensure effective financial management
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and changes in accounting regulationsSkills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Accounting or Finance
Masters degree is preferred.
Proven working experience as an Accountant
Advanced knowledge of accounting software and MS Excel
Familiarity with financial regulations and reporting requirements
Strong attention to detail and accuracy
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines

. Ability to maintain confidentiality of sensitive information
